transcript.text: Shalom Shalom everyone it is Friday
August the 24th 2018 and I had wanted to
make this video outside but it's just
way too rainy and wet for me to do that
Wow
clouds are covering up all the gorgeous
mountains anyway so I guess another day
so yeah I wanted to share some pretty
edifying news last night I was let me
back up
so a couple days ago a candidate for the
governor of Oregon his name's Aaron Auer
he's a candidate who from the
Constitution Party which is a third
party anyway he's running for governor
of Oregon and he was shot to me through
my website he said he had seen some of
my videos on the exposing of pedophilia
in Hollywood and so he wanted to reach
out to me and so he did and so last
night
we arranged a phone call and we talked
for quite a while and it was just a very
very edifying conversation first of all
he told me he was really encouraged and
edified by my youtubes in exposing all
this pedophilia going on in Hollywood he
was really blessed by that and then he
shared me a little bit about what he's
doing what his mission is in Oregon as
he's running for governor out there he
he found he discovered a while back
these statues that are basically at the
State Capitol in Salem Oregon of these
Jason Lee who was a circuit writer back
in the 1800s and the the Indians the
Native Americans that were living in the
Oregon Territory at the time in the
early 1800s they had had these visions
and dreams where they were waiting for
someone to bring to them the book of
heaven which is basically the Bible and
so Jason Lee who was a circuit writer he
was on a horse he basically was

Territory at the time so he was able to
reach out to a lot of the Native
Americans back then anyway so he
discovered these statues that were
dedicated to the circuit writers of the

it really inspired him because he
thought wow these are the the roots of
Oregon you know and then he went to the
coast at one point the Lord told him to
go to the coast to pray and he went to
the coast to pray and he and he happened
to go to a small town called Depot Bay
which is just south of Lincoln City and
he went into a certain bookstore a used
bookstore and he actually found one of
the oldest Bibles in Oregon whose dated
back into the early 1800s that was
actually used a Bible that Jason Lee
carried and used as he was you know
witnessing to the
Americans so he was age he was able to
purchase this Bible and now he has it
was just kind of confirmation so you
know he's been telling me that as he's
been running for governor he's been you
know trying to speak at various churches
and venues across the state of Oregon he
actually is on the ballot he's been able
to get on the ballot as a candidate and
he's got enough signatures so that he
was included in the voters pamphlet
guide which is a guide that the state of

Oregon which I guess is over a million
people and it has all of his statements
about how he loves the Messiah and he's
defending the scripture and he wants to
bring Oregon back to a righteous
leadership and he's had several because

leaders legislators to the governor
herself Kate brown
he actually got a chance to speak to

he you know he told me he was very frank

actually
